00022 /*  Internal class which represents the decoder for
00023     native images. The class may not be used by
00024     the MMI in a direct manner and the interface
00025     may be changed in future releases. */
00026 class NativeImageDecoder : public ImageDecoder {
00027     typedef ImageDecoder Base;
00028     
00029     public:
00030         static NativeImageDecoder* GetInstance();
00031 
00032         // @see ImageDeocder::GetMetaData
00033         virtual BOOLEAN GetMetaData(Image& image, Image::MetaData* meta_data);
00034 
00035         // @see ImageDeocder::BeginDecoding
00036         virtual BOOLEAN BeginDecoding(const Image& image, INT frame_idx = 0);
00037 
00038         // @see ImageDeocder::EndDecoding
00039         virtual void EndDecoding(const Image& image, INT frame_idx = 0);
00040 
00041         /*  Returns a pointer to the scanline buffer. May only invoked
00042             inside NativeImageDecoder::BeginDecoding and NativeImageDecoder::EndDecoding. */
00043         UINT8* GetScanlineBuffer() const { return m_scanline_buffer; }
00044 
00045         /*  Returns the size of the scanline in bytes. May only invoked
00046             inside NativeImageDecoder::BeginDecoding and NativeImageDecoder::EndDecoding. */
00047         UINT GetScanlineSize() const { return m_scanline_size; }
00048 
00049         /*  Returns a pointer to the alpha buffer. May only invoked
00050             inside NativeImageDecoder::BeginDecoding and NativeImageDecoder::EndDecoding. */
00051         UINT8* GetAlphaBuffer() const { return m_alpha_buffer; }
00052 
00053         /*  Decodes a scanline into the scanline buffer and the alpha buffer. May only invoked
00054             inside NativeImageDecoder::BeginDecoding and NativeImageDecoder::EndDecoding. */
00055         BOOLEAN DecodeScanline(INT scanline_idx,
00056                                INT old_scanline_idx,
00057                                UINT8* dest_buffer = 0);
00058 
00059         /*  Returns the frame index where the decoder is used. May only invoked
00060             inside NativeImageDecoder::BeginDecoding and NativeImageDecoder::EndDecoding. */
00061         INT GetFrameIndex() const { return m_frame_idx; }
00062 
00063     private:
00064         BOOLEAN m_compressed;
00065         BOOLEAN m_indexed;
00066         UINT32 m_frame_offset;
00067         UINT8 m_alpha_bits;
00068         INT m_frame_idx;
00069         UINT m_scanline_size;
00070         UINT8* m_scanline_buffer;
00071         UINT m_width;
00072         UINT8* m_index_buffer;
00073         UINT8* m_alpha_buffer;
00074         ColorValue* m_local_color_table;
00075         BinData* m_bin_data;
00076         SwitchedRleCompression::Context m_compression_context;
00077 
00078         static NativeImageDecoder m_decoder;
00079 
00080         NativeImageDecoder();
00081         INT16 GetInt16Value(const UINT8* buffer) const;
00082         INT32 GetInt32Value(const UINT8* buffer) const;
00083         BOOLEAN ReadLocalColorTable();
00084         BOOLEAN DecodeIndexedScanline(INT scanline_idx,
00085                                       INT old_scanline_idx,
00086                                       UINT8* dest_buffer);
00087 
00090         UINT GetIndexedAlphaByteCount() const;
00091 };
00092 #endif // DOXYGEN_SHOULD_SKIP_THIS

00233

00242         };
00243 
00244         void SetTransparent(BOOLEAN transparent) { m_bits.transparent = transparent; }
00245         void SetTransparentColor(ColorValue color_value) { m_transparent_color = color_value; }
00246         void SetCopyrighted(BOOLEAN copyrighted) { m_bits.copyrighted = copyrighted; }
00247         INT16 GetDefaultFrameDelay() const { return 300; }
00248         void InitProperties();
